meanings.definition: The quality or state of being acidic.
meanings.sent1: The acidnesses of the lemon juice made my mouth pucker.
meanings.sent2: I could taste the acidnesses in the vinegar.
meanings.sent3: The acidnesses of the tomatoes gave the chef a sour surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her words had an acidnesses that stung like vinegar.
meanings.sent5: The acidnesses of the battery was so strong it burned my skin.

meanings.definition: The presence of acid in a substance.
meanings.sent1: The acidnesses of the solution was evident from its sour smell.
meanings.sent2: The scientist tested the acidnesses of the liquid in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The acidnesses of the orange juice surprised the thirsty hiker.
meanings.sent4: The acidnesses of the situation was like a hidden danger waiting to erupt.
meanings.sent5: The acidnesses of the pickles was so strong it made my eyes water.
